src_text: Kabinete e kopane ka Laboraro, 6 Phupu 2018, ka Union Buildings, Pretori Merero seemong sa bjale1.
trg_text: Cabinet met on Wednesday, 6 June 2018, at the Union Buildings, Pretori Issues in the environment1.Economy Cabinet has noted the decline of 2,2% in the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) in the first quarter of 2018.

src_text: IkonomiKabinete e lemogile go theoga ga Bolengkakaret o bja Dithoto le Ditirelo (GDP) mo kotareng ya mathomo ya 2018.
trg_text: Cabinet approved the reviewed Policy Framework for Accreditation of Diversion Services in South Afric The policy framework was put in place in 2010 in line with the Child Justice Act, 2008 (Act 75 of 2008).

src_text: oma go ela maikemi et ong a go kgoboket a R1,2 trilione ka dipeelet o t e difsa mo mengwageng ye mehlano yeo e tlago, yeo e tla bago le ditlamorago t e bohlokwa kgolong ya ikonomi le tlholegong ya me omo Dipeelet oKabinete e amogela go tsebagat wa ga feme ye mpsha ya maemo a bolefase yeo e dirago dit welet wa t a theknolot i ya tshedimo o le ya dikgokagano gola East London, Kapa Bohlabela, ka khamphani yeo e laolwago ka botlalo ke bathobas Dipeelet o t e t a R1 bilione di tla hlola me omo ye mefsa le ya khwalithi ye 1000 godimo ga ba omi bao ba lego gona ba 450, bont i bja bona e lego bafsa le basadDipeelet o t e di holegile go t wa go Diputselet o t a Mananeokgoparara a Lefapha la go Ikgetha la Ikonomi le Peakanyotiro ya Bahlomi ba Diintasteri t a Bathobaso (BIS) ka bobedi ga on BIS e dirile gore Kgoro ya Bogwebi le Intasteri (dti) e dumelele thekgo ya diputselet o go bahlomi ba 103 ba dikgwebo t a bathobaso mo mengwageng ya dit helete ye mebedi yeo e fetileg Dikhamphani t e 48 le t ona di abet we thekgo ya go fihlelela mebaraka, t e seswai t a t ona di kua Kapa Bohlabela Moputso wa Motheo wa Boset haba (NMW)Kabinete e amogela go dumelelwa ga Molaokakanywa wa NWM ka Lekgotlakgothakgothe la Boset hab Kabinete e laet a go thaba ga yona go bakgathatema ka moka Khanseleng ya Boset haba ya Tlhabollo ya Ikonomi le Ba omi ka tema ya bona ya go fihlelela kwano y A ke ona mathomomayo a tshepedi o ya go fokot a go se lekalekane ga meputso, kudukudu go bao ba hwet ago meputso ya fase kud Ba omi ba go balelwa go 6,4 milione mo Afrika Borwa ba tla holega ge Molaokakanywa wo o
trg_text: The GDP results bring into sharp focus the need for all sectors of the country to work together to support South Africa s local econom Business and labour need to continue to work with government in support of initiatives such as the Nine-Point Plan to stimulate economic growth and create much-needed job One of its key pillars is the Industrial Policy Action Plan (IPAP), which focuses on increasing manufacturing, employment creation and export Cabinet is confident that the IPAP will help grow our industrial sector and economLater this year, government will host an International Investment Summit to profile South Africa as an investment destinatio The aim of the event is to work towards generating R1,2 trillion in new investments over the next five years, which will have a significant impact on economic growth and employment creation Investments Cabinet welcomes the launch of a new world-class factory that manufactures information and communications technology products in East London in the Eastern Cape on 5 June 2018 by Yekani Manufacturing, a wholly black-owned compan This R1-billion investment will create 1 000 new quality jobs in addition to the existing workforce of 450, mostly youth and womeThis investment has benefited from both the Special Economic Zone Infrastructure Incentive and the Black Industrialist Scheme (BIS).

src_text: et e o saenet we go ba mola Le ge go le bjalo, Kabinete e lemoga gore go sant e go nale mo omo wo mogolo wo o swanet ego go dirwa go fedi a go se lekalekane ga meputso elego tlhobaboroko yeo e sant ego e le gona mo nagenMolaokakanywa wo o tla romelwa Lekgotleng la Boset haba la Diprofense gore o kwanelwe pele Mopresidente a ka o saena gore e be molao Ditirelo t a motheoKabinete e thabi it we ke dipoelo t a Dipalopalo t e esego t a Dit helete t a Mebasepala t a 2017 t a go lokollwa ke StatsS Dipoelo t e di laedit e gore badiri i ba bant i ba amoget e ditirelo t a motheo t a mahala bjalo ka mohlagase, meetse le tlhweki o ka 2017 ge go bapet wa leka 2016.
trg_text: The BIS saw the Department of Trade and Industry (the dti) approving incentive support to 103 black industrialists over the previous two financial year Forty-eight companies were also provided with market access support, eight of which are in the Eastern Cape National Minimum Wage (NMW)Cabinet welcomes the passing of the NMW Bill by the National Assembl It expresses its appreciation to all stakeholders at the National Economic Development and Labour Council for their role in reaching this agreemen This begins a process towards narrowing the wage gap, especially for the low income earner Approximately 6,4 million workers in South Africa will benefit once the Bill has been signed into la Cabinet, however, acknowledges that more work still needs to be done to close the wage disparities that still exist in the countr The Bill will now be sent to the National Council of Provinces for concurrence before the President signs it into law Basic servicesCabinet is pleased with the results of the Non-financial Census of Municipalities 2017 released by StatsS The results showed more consumers have received free basic services such as electricity, water and sanitation in 2017 as compared with 2016.

src_text: Mmu o o sant e o ikgafile go abela badudi ka moka ditirelo t a let at i ka let at i, kudukudu batho ba go ihlokel Prot eke ya moragorago ya go amana le meetse ke Prot eke ya Meetse ya Mhlathuze ya R96 milione gola Richards Bay KwaZulu-Natal elego yeo e tla abelago malapa a go feta 6 000 meetse a go nwa Ditheri ano t a meputso t a Ditirelo t a Set habaKabinete e amoget e sedimo et o go t wa go Tona ya Kgoro ya Tirelo le Taolo ya Set haba (DPSA) mo ditheri anong t a meputso t a Ditirelo t a Set hab Kabinete e amogela boikgafo bja bakgathatema ka moka bja go hwet a tharollo ye boreledi yeo e tla holago bakgathatema ka mok Kabinete e netefat a boikgafo bja mmu o bja go reri ana le ba omi ka nepo ya go fihlelela kwano yeo e
trg_text: Government remains committed to providing daily basic services to all its citizens, especially poor peopl The most recent water-related project is the R96-million Mhlathuze Water Project in Richards Bay in KwaZulu-Natal, which will deliver running tap water to more than 6 000 households Public Service wage negotiationsCabinet received a briefing from the Minister of Public Service and Administration on the Public Service wage negotiation Cabinet appreciates the commitment by all stakeholders in finding an amicable solution that would benefit all role player Cabinet reaffirms government s commitment to fully engage with labour so as to arrive at a workable deal for all involved Social grants Cabinet reassures beneficiaries of social grants that government will continue providing this important service, as mandated by the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996.

trg_text: Saharawi Arab Democratic Republic State VisitPresident Cyril Ramaphosa hosted his Saharawi Arab Democratic Republic counterpart, Brahim Ghali, on 4 June 2018 during a State Visit to the countrCabinet expresses its solidarity with the people of Saharawi in their fight for independence and calls on the international community to provide the necessary support to the people of Saharaw Messages23.

src_text: Dithu o t a t helete ya leagodi tla t welapele go lefelwa gomme tshepedi o ya go i a karata ya gago ya Et ensi ya Afrika Borwa ya T hirelet ego ya Leago (SASSA) ya bjale gore o hwet e ye mpsha e tla t welapele go fihlela mafelelong a Lewedi 2018.T homi ano magareng ga SASSA le Poskantoro ya Afrika Borwa (SAPO) e laet a dipoelo t e botse ka ge ga e sale go tloga ka Mopitlo 2018, baamogedi ba bant i ba be ba tli a dikarata t a bona t a kgale gore ba hwet e t e difsKabinete e dira boipilet o set habeng go hlokomologa melaet a ye mekopana yeo e laelago baamogedi ba dithu o t a t helete ya leago go ingwadi a ka lefsa go efoga gore dithu o t a bona t a t helete ya leago di emi we go lefelw Melaet a yeo ya go lahlet a ke ya go hlola feela kgakanego bathong ba go hloka le go fapo a mmu o mo omong wa ona wa go netefat a gore dimphiwafela di lefelwa gabotse go baamogedi ba t ona ntle le t hitego Leboa BodikelaKabinete e amoget e pego ya boraro ya kgatelopele go t wa go Sehlophat homo sa Magareng ga Ditona (IMTT) gola Leboa Bodikel Kabinete e kgotsofadit we ke kgatelopele yeo e dirilwego go tsent ha tiri ong Karolo 100(1) (a) le (b) yeo e kgopet wego dikgorong t a profense t a Leboa Bodikel Go dumelet we gape gore goya pele IMTT e tla begela Kabinete ka kgatelopele ye nngwe le ye nngwe ye e dirwago gatee ka kgwedi go kgont ha dihlopha t eo di thwet wego mo profenseng go gatelapele ka mo omKabinete e thekgile ketelo ya go leba Profenseng ya Leboa Bodikela ka la 7 Phupu 2018 go sedimo a Lekgotlaphethi i la Leboa Bodikela, Lekgothatheramolao la Profense le bahlaki i ba ka ntle bao ba rwelego maikarabelo a profense ye
trg_text: North WestCabinet received a third progress report from the Inter-Ministerial Task Team (IMTT) on North Wes Cabinet is satisfied with the progress made to operationalise the invoked Section 100(1) (a) and (b) in the North West provincial department It was further approved that the IMTT will onwards report to Cabinet once a month to enable the teams deployed in the province to continue with the worCabinet endorsed a visit to the North West on 7 June 2018 to brief the North West Executive, Provincial Legislature and the external auditors responsible for the province Protest action Cabinet condemns the recent violent protests around the country, and is especially saddened by the acts of violence and intimidation of patients and medical staff at the Charlotte Maxeke Johannesburg Academic Hospita Protestors who exercise their rights to protest should do so without violating the rights of others, particularly the vulnerabl No amount of grievance justifies violence and the threatening behaviour seen in the past week Safety and securityCabinet welcomes and supports the

src_text: Magato a boipelat oKabinete e sola magato a moragorago a boipelat o bja dikgaruru go potologa naga, ebile e nyami wa kudu ke ditiragalo t a dikgaruru le t a mat ho et i t a balwet i le ba omedi ba Bookelo bja Johannesburg bja Charlotte Maxek Baipelaet i bao ba phethagat ago ditokelo t a bona t a go ipelaet a ba swanet e go dira bjalo ntle le go gataka ditokelo t a batho ba bangwe, kudukudu bao maphelo a bona a lego kotsin Ga gona kelo ya boipelaet o yeo e ka
trg_text: Condolences2 Cabinet joins President Ramaphosa in sending heartfelt condolences to the family and friends of the five boys who died in a blaze at the Masiya informal settlement in Philippi, Cape TowThe fire also displaced 30 residents of the informal settlemen Government is working hard to ensure that there is housing, security and comfort for all South African Congratulations2 Cabinet wishes African National Congress veteran Baba Andrew Mokete Mlangeni a happy belated birthda Baba Mlangeni celebrated his 93rd birthday on Wednesday, 6 June 2018.

trg_text: Science and TechnologyCabinet notes astrological developments over the past weekend when astronomers working with the Catalina Sky Survey in Arizona, USA, discovered a small asteroid (2018 LA) near the orbit of the Moon, which hours later made contact with Eart The resultant explosion which sent waves of low-frequency sound (infrasound) rippling through the atmosphere were detected by an infrasound monitor in South Africa, which was deployed as part of the International Monitoring System of the Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treat This highlights the growing capability of modern sky surveys to discover asteroids targeting Earth and South Africa s internationally recognised capabilit

src_text: Kgwedi ya BafsaKabinete e dira boipilet o go maAfrika Borwa go kgatha tema ya bona mananeong le diprot ekeng t a maatlafat o ya bafsa ka Kgwedi ye ya Bafsa ya Phup Ngwageng wo ke meketeko ya Tata Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela le Mama Albertina Nontsikelelo Sisulu le gona Kgwedi ya Bafsa ya 2018 e thabelwa ka fase ga morero wo:
trg_text: Group of Seven (G7) SummitCabinet welcomes South Africa s invitation to attend the upcoming G7 Summit in Canad South Africa participated in the summit seven years ago and this invitation is an indication of renewed confidence in the South African econom Our government will seek to use the opportunity to invite investors to inject capital into our econom Investment is necessary for economic growth and job creation on a scale that will significantly reduce current levels of unemploymen South Africa-India 125 Years Anniversary Event As part of the Nelson Mandela and Albertina Sisulu centenary celebrations, Cabinet welcomes the commemoration on 7 June 2018 of Mahatma Gandhi s removal from a train at Pietermaritzburg Station 125 years ag This event spurred Gandhi s philosophy of Satyagraha (truth-force), which had a significant influence on our political leadership and contributed to our liberation struggl 22.

src_text: Phelela bohwa: Re katanela bafsa bao ba maatlafet ego maphelong a bona le ikonoming .Ka gona go hlohlelet wa ke bohwa bja balwelatokologo, go nyakega gore bafsa ba maatlafale go kgatha tema ye mafolofolo tlhabollong ya set haba sa gabobona ka nepo ya go
trg_text: Live the legacy: Towards a socio-economically empowered youth .Inspired by their iconic legacies, young people need to be empowered to take up a more active role in developing their communities with a view to working together to develop South Afric Government is working hard to ensure that youth are able to access the many support and educational government programmes that would enhance their participation in the econom 11.

trg_text: Preliminary and mid-term examsCabinet calls on parents and guardians to support, within necessary means, children who are writing preliminary and mid-term examinations taking place across the countr Cabinet warmly appreciates the vital role child caregivers play in shaping our future leaders whilst creating conducive and safe environments for our children to lear We also encourage all learners to continue studying and striving to do their besCabinet also welcomes the reopening of schools in various parts of North West, including Koster and Rustenbur This comes after weeks of protests and disruptions in teaching and learning in the area Cabinet urges parents, learners and teachers to collaborate in trying to recover the lost time and fully commit to catch-up programme Drought and fireCabinet reminds South Africans that the country is still experiencing drough South Africa is one of the 30-driest countries in the world and the lower-than-normal rainfalls have worsened the situatio All people must continue partnering with government to conserve water so as to ensure there is sufficient supply for al As we enter the winter season, Cabinet calls on communities to take extra care to prevent shack and veld fire Government continues to work with communities to promote safety measures at this time when many use various forms of fuel and heating to keep war

trg_text: Cabinet approved the National Health Insurance (NHI) Bill of 2018 to be published in the Government Gazette for public commen The Bill seeks to establish the NHI Fund of South Africa, as a public entity, so as to provide for a sustained universal health access that is affordable and of high qualit It also sets out its functions, powers and dutieThe Bill provides a framework for the active purchasing of healthcare services by the fund on behalf of users and creates mechanisms for the equitable, effective and efficient use of the resources of the fund to meet the health needs of user The Minister of Health will next week hold a full media briefing to unpack this Bil Cabinet approved for the introduction of the Science and Technology Laws Amendment Bill of 2017 to Parliamen The Bill harmonizes the provisions which regulate the operations and governance of the public entities that report to the Minister of Science and Technolog This will ensure consistency in all requirements to be met and processes to be followe

trg_text: Player of the Year award It has been a remarkable year for young Rabada who among other achievements, rose to the No 1 bowling ranking in the world in Test match cricke He is currently the leading wicket-taker for 2018 and also ranked No 7 in One Day International cricke 2 Cabinet welcomes the appointment of Siya Kolisi as the first black captain of the Springbok team for the three match test series against Englan We are confident that he will do South Africa proud as our captain, and will inspire others by his actions and leadership on and off the field of pla 2 Cabinet welcomes the appointment of Finance Minister Nhlanhla Nene as Chairperson of the New Development Bank (NDB) Board of Governor The NDB is a multilateral development bank established by Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa (BRICS) in 2014.

src_text: Kabinete e dumelet e tlhagi o pele ga Palamente ya pego ya 2016/17 ya tiragat o ya Mananeo a Diputselet o t a Mot helo t a Diphati i o le Tlhabollo (R&D).
trg_text: Cabinet approved for the submission of the 2016/17 report on the performance of the Research and Development (R&D) Tax-Incentive Programme to Parliamen The incentive programme has enabled companies to diversify their R&D portfolio, generate intellectual property and create new product The incentive programme, which was introduced in November 2006, is being implemented by the Department of Science and Technology together with the South African Revenue Service and National Treasur From March 2016 to February 2017, a total of 153 R&D tax-incentive applications were received from 117 companies, 58 of which were first-time applicant The applications were for 571 R&D projects worth an estimated R3,6 billio Cabinet is pleased with the growth in the number of companies that invest in R&D and continues to call on business to invest more in R&D, which remains an important pillar of our efforts to grow the econom 15.

src_text: Lenaneo le la diputselet o le kgont hit e dikhamphani go feto a mafapha a t ona a R&D, go kgoboket a thoto ya kelello le go hlola dit welet wa t e difs Lenaneo la diputselet o, leo le tsebagadit wego ka Dibatsele 2006, le gare le phethagat wa ke Kgoro ya Saense le Theknolot i gotee le Ditirelo t a Met helo t a Afrika Borwa le Matlotlo a Boset habGo tloga ka Hlakola 2016 go fihla ka Dibokwane 2017, palomoka ya dikgopelo t e 153 t a diputselet o t a met helo t a R&D di amoget we go t wa dikhamphaning t e 117, t e 58 t a t ona ebile dikgopelo t a lekga la mathom Dikgopelo t eo e be e le t a diprot eke t e 571 t a R&D t a go bit a t helete ya go balelwa R3,6 bilion Kabinete e thabi it we ke kgolo ya palo ya dikhamphani t a go beelet a go R&D ebile e t welapele go dira boipilet o dikgwebong go beelet a kudu mo go R&D, elego kokwane ye bohlokwa ya maitekelo a rena a go godi a ikonom Kabinete e dumelet e go phatlalat wa ga ditekolonyaki i o t a 2016/17 dikhwameng t a mmu o bakeng sa Ditiragalo t a Saenthefiki le t a Theknolot
trg_text: Social grants will continue to be paid and the process to replace the old South African Social Security Agency (SASSA) card with the new one will continue until the end of September 2018.

src_text: Ditekolonyaki i o t e di lekola ngwaga ka ngwaga tiragat o ya lefapha la saense le theknolot i, le tema ya lefapha le kgolong le tlhabollong ya Afrika Borw Kabinete e lemogile ditlhaelelo t a tekanyet okabo t eo di tli it ego kgolo ya go nanya ya disenyegelo t a R&D go ralala dikgor Kabinete e dumelet e Tlhako ya Pholisi yeo e sekasekilwego ya Tumelelo ya Pheti et o ya Ditirelo ya Afrika Borw Tlhako ye ya pholisi e hlomilwe ka 2010 ka go tsamai ana le Molao wa Toka ya Bana 2008 (Molao 75 wa 2008).Tshepedi o ya tshekatsheko e lebelet e go netefat a gore baabi ba ditirelo t a pheti et o le mananeo a pheti et o a obamela maemo a motheo ka dinako t ohl Dikgaolo t e tshela di feto it we go kaonafat a khwalithi le maemo a ditirelo t eo di abelwago bana bao ba humanwego ba le kgahlanong le mola Kabinete e dumelet e Leanopeakanyo la Kopano ya Dilete ya Polokego ya Tlhago gotee le phethagat o ya yon Theknolot i ya tlhago e lemogwa bjalo ka t hu umet o ye holofet ago ya kgolo ya ikonomi le sediri wa se segolo twant hong ya tlala le bohloki, kudukudu dinageng t eo di hlabologag
trg_text: South African Special Risk Insurance Association Board: Mr Norman Tinyiko Baloyi (Non-Executive Director and Chairperson) Ms Priscilla Onkgodisitse Mokonyane (Non-Executive Director and Deputy Chairperson) Ms Bajabulile Luthuli (Executive Director); and

src_text: Leanopeakanyo le le tla kgont ha kgwebi ano magareng ga dinaga t a Afrika le go kaonafat a phadi ano ya selete se mebarakeng ya lefase ka bophar Le tla kaonafat a gape le t homi ano le tsenelano ya Afrika Borwa ka gare ga selete sa dinaga t a Afrik Melaokakanywa18.
trg_text: National Metrology Institute of South Africa (NMISA): Mr Ndwakhulu Samuel Mukhufhi (reappointment as Chief Executive Officer).

src_text: Kabinete e dumelet e Molaokakanywa wa 2018 wa In orense ya Boset haba ya Maphelo (NHI) wo o tla phatlalat wago ka gare ga Kuranta ya Mmu o gore set haba se fe ditshwayotshwayo t a son Molaokakanywa wo o
trg_text: Mr Molelekoa Petrus Mohlomi Mr Odirile Welcome Dingoko Ms Bavelile Gloria Hlongwa Ms Nobom Gcinashe Mfabana Ms Lindie Lankalebalelo Ms Jabu Vuyiswa Mogadime (reappointment); and Dr Tshengedzeni Demana (the dti representative).

src_text: et ane le go hloma Sekhwama sa NHI sa Afrika Borwa bjalo ka kgwebo ya set haba e le gona go aba khumanego yeo e swarelelago ya gohle ya maphelo ya go rekega le ya maemo a godim Molaokakanywa wo o thea gape mehola, maatla le maikarabelo a sekhwama sMolaokakanywa wo o fana ka tlhako ya theko ye mafolofolo ya ditirelo t a tlhokomelo ya maphelo ka sekhwama se legatong la badiri i le go hlola magato a t homi o ya go lekalekana, ya mohola le ya tsheket o ya didiri wa t a sekhwama go fihlelela dinyakwa t a maphelo t a badiri
trg_text: Reappointment of Mr Rakesh Garach as Non-Executive Chairperson of the National Empowerment Fund Board of Trustee 30.

src_text: Tona ya Maphelo o tlare bekeng ye tlago a swara sedimo o ya botlalo le babegaditaba go hlatholla Molaokakanywa w Kabinete e dumelet e go tsebagat wa ga Molaokakanywa wa Pheto o ya Melao ya Saense le Theknolot i wa 2017 Palamenten Molaokakanywa wo o gata ka mo ito o tee le ditiro le pu o ya dikgwebo t a mmu o t eo di begago thwii go Tona ya Saense le Theknolot

src_text: omi a monyetla wo go lalet a babeelet i go tsenyelet a t helete ka ikonoming ya ren Dipeelet o di maleba kgolong ya ikonomi le tlholegong ya me omo mo kelong yeo e tla fokot ago kudu maemo a bjale a tlhokego ya me om Tiragalo ya Anibesari ya mengwaga ye 125 ya Afrika Borwa le IndiaBjalo ka karolo ya meketeko ya mengwaga ye lekgolo ya Nelson Mandela le Albertina Sisulu, Kabinete e amogela meketeko ka la 7 Phupu 2018 e lego let at i la go nt hwa ga Mahatma Gandhi go t wa setimeleng kua Setei eneng sa Pietermaritzburg mengwageng ye 125 yeo e fetileg Tiragalo ye e hlohleledit e dikgopolo t a maphefo t a Satyagraha (meeno ya nnete), t eo di bilego le khuet o ye kgolo go baetapele ba rena ba dipolotiki le go kgatha tema phenkgi anong ya rena ya tokolog Ketelo ya Semmu o ke Rephabliking ya Temokrasi ya Saharawi ArabMopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa o kopane le molekani ka yena wa Rephabliki ya Temokrasi ya Saharawi Arab, ebago Brahim Ghali,ka la 4 Phupu 2018 nakong ya Ketelo ya Semmu o nageng yKabinete e rata go laet a thekgo ya yona gotee le batho ba Saharawi mo twant hong ya bona ya go ikema ebile e dira boipilet o set habeng sa bodit habat haba go fana ka thekgo ye maleba go batho ba Saharaw Melaet a23.

src_text: oma ka thata go netefat a gore go nale dintlo, t hirelet ego le boiketlo go MaAfrika Borwa ka mok Ditebogi o2 Kabinete e lakalet a mogale wa African National Congress Baba Andrew Mokete Mlangeni let at i leo le fetilego la matswalo a lethab Baba Mlangenio ketekile matswalo a gagwe a mengwaga ye 93 ka Laboraro, 6 Phupu 2018.O be a le magareng ga batho ba mathomothomo ba go romelwa tlhahlong ya se ole ka ntle ga Afrika Borwa le gona morago ga gore a golegwe ge a goroga ka nageng, o ile a bonwa le go ahlolelwa kgolego ya bophelo ka moka gola Robben IslandKabinete e lebogi a sebapadi sa go bet a kgwele ka lebelo la godimo sa sehlopha sa Proteas Kagiso
